entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 20 early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 70%
